name: Bad Luck Alien
description:
In Bad Luck Alien, you play an alien who has come to earth for vacation only to be rudely interrupted by an apocalyptic fireball. Jump, shoot, and slide your way through the two levels included in this game, outrun the fire and get to your ship. 

Developed over the course of 48 hours for the Game Makers' Toolkit game jam. The player's jump and shoot abilities and the enemies were designed around the theme for this jam of dual purpose design.

I'm currently a student of game design, but this was the first game jam I've participated in. If you play Bad Luck Alien, let me know what you think in the comments of this page!
